price: Ou dizem eles: "É um poeta, de quem aguardamos a surpresa da morte"
arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٞ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيۡبَ ٱلۡمَنُونِ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: am yaqūlūna shāʿirun natarabbaṣu bihi rayba al-manūni
